## MergeIntersection type

Merge an intersection of types into one type, mostly for tooltip-readability in IDEs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MergeIntersection<T> = T extends Record<PropertyKey, unknown>
    ? {
          [P in keyof T]: T[P];
      } & {}
    : T;
```
